Text: Preliminary Floor Plan Cc Market Service Team has reviewed their requirements for the proposed relocation of ETS within the Enron building Under this plan Gas Control would not move from their current location and the Market Service Teams would be in close proximity to Transactional Marketing and Facility Planning Julias intent is to have discussion with Danny to make sure the organizations are aligned to support the commercial teams Please let me know if you have any questions Donna

BlackBerry by SkyTel Service and iPAQ Cc You have been selected to receive either a BlackBerry or iPAQ if you feel it will meet your business needs The BlackBerry provides the following features Fully interactive write send receive and respond to messages right from the unit Synchronize all email composed and responded to via your handheld with your desktop email Email responses from RIM handhelds appear exactly as if they came from your desktop email Access web information including stock quotes news travel sports entertainment and more Coverage that follows you nationwide with no roaming fees The iPAQ pocket PC is Simple to use slim and powerful Pocket PC in a leek elegant design Wirelessready access to email internetintranet and corporate network Modular expansion packs for expandability and flexibility Industryleading hand held capabilities for the enterprise Extensive software suite If you choose the BlackBerry device it will also replace your current pager For more information or to schedule a preview of these devices call Jean McFarland at Upon ordering you will need to provide Jean McFarland an email with your name and external ID Your external ID is located in eHRonlineenroncom To find it log in to eHRonlineenroncom Select Personal Information then select other This will bring you to your personal info page Your external ID is located in approximately the middle of the page to the right of your SAP ID Please reply by Wednesday October th If you have any questions dont hesitate to give me a call at Regards Donna

Meeting to Discuss Purchasing Cc I would like to meet with all the assistants to discuss purchasing and invoice payments I have run detailed line items out of SAP for review of expenditures Please plan to attend a brief meeting in on Monday December at PM At that time we will discuss office supply purchases If you can not attend please let me know Donna

Projected Headcount ending and I submitted the estimated headcount worksheets today based on the assumptions from the following worksheet The worksheet reflects the cost center that each employee is identified under in the HR system Please review this information and start to think about how employees need to be realigned in to accurately reflect what company they should rollup to We will need to identify this information soon for budget purposes For individuals that provide services for more than one company I will need a breakout for each company If you have any questions please advise Donna
Confidential Mid Year Overview Cc Please review the attachment and let me know if you have any changes The final document will provide a starting place for the year end review process
worksheet for you bothI thought you both might want to work together for the Customer Service Teams I hope this helps

Employee Company Level Changes for Cc Please make the following Company and Cost Center changes for In addition the following org charts show corrections in conjunction with these changes Please update them Please advise if you have any questions Donna

Reduced Of interest Gas Logistics combined payroll is The Plans were built with a combined merit and other which equates to At the combined merit and other equates to a reduction of Over the next few days I will be rebuilding the revised plan for distribution Donna

Red Phone Locations Cc I have checked on the status of the s after the move and they play a critical role in our communication plan if the Lucent phones are down Big backhoes can dig ditches and accidentally cut cables as we have seen in the past The s are outside of our current Lucent phone switch and give us the ability to make outside calls Currently s are located and connected correctly at the following locations John Buchanan EBN Pat Barry EBN Tracy Minter EBN But we need additional s installed at the following locations Terry Kowalke EBN Jack Howard EBNE Sherry Forbish EBNA This will accommodate Gas Logistics interim phone coverage plan between moves Please check to determine if the cost of these additional installations were included in the regular move schedule If you have any questions please advise We will place a at the reconnection site Thanks for you assistance Donna

TW Move Information Cc The following individuals are scheduled to move September th Thursday Please have your boxes and equipment labeled by pm You will receive a packet on the day of your move from the move team that contains information pertinent to your move Be sure to use the preprinted colored labels to identify all items included in your move A diagram is included for you to specify how you would like your new desktop arranged Please let me know if you have any concerns or questions Good Luck Donna Floor Phone From To Printers To Comments Schoolcraft Darrell J g a etsmarketservicesj Kowalke Terry G Giambrone Laura G Minter Tracy H Mulligan Amy J a etsmarketservicesl McEvoy Christine K Hernandez Bert M Miller Chris F dual phone Beverly Miller Ward Linda E Copier a Narrow walkway or a
CONFIDENTIAL IMMEDIATE ATTENTION PAA LISTHere is the PPA request and the list of employees by company cost center and supervisor This has been submitted to HR Donna and Brad

Data RequestLynn I wanted to let you know that Ava did an excellent job this week during the data request collection She worked late accommodated everyones needs Mary Kay and I just wanted you to be aware of her dedication Donna

Citizens We have a signed agreement Cc I received a call from Sarabeth Smith stating that as of PM today July we have a signed agreement with Citizens The plant is not expected to come back on line until Thursday or Friday per Darrell Amy is coordinating a conference call with Craig Lipke to transition the transaction management to TW Darrell will notify Gas Control that we are taking over the monitoring of alarms and set point flowpressure control I will coordinate the labor distribution for both Gas Control and Customer Service Collectively between the two groups we will be charging out per month I want to express my thanks to Darrell Dale Terry John and Amy for helping to put this deal together And of course the field personnel Donna

EAMR Griffith Allocation Cc Ava Commencing with the August pay period please start coding of Amy Milligans time to work order E This is according to our payout for the CitizensEAMR agreement Continue to use this methodology until further notice If you have any questions please advise Thanks Donna
Vacation Schedule Cc My current vacation plans for the remainder of are Nov in Houston and Dec in Kansas Donna Scott

Commission MeetingI thought you might find this interesting Next was a presentation by Staff on the California Update Staff gave some interesting statistics consumption grew in while capacity increased by Instate capacity will be insufficient to meet peak demand Within the new generation of MW will come on line in MW will be under construction and MW has been either tabled or cancelled Hydropower accounts for and will play a significant role in the next five years This places California at the mercy of snow pack conditions for up to of its requirements Last year the snow pack was of typical and this year it is at Natural gas accounts for of the states needs therefore is imported from outside the state from Southwest Canada and from the Rocky Mountain pipesGas fired generation will decline in the next five years according to staff for three reasons new generation facilities coming on line hydro will be at normal or above levels neighboring states will sell into California If there are surprises such as shortterm price volatility economic growth outpaces projects low hydro conditions energy conservation declines California will experience similar conditions to last year

Red Phone Locations Cc I have checked on the status of the s after the move and they play a critical role in our communication plan if the Lucent phones are down Big backhoes can dig ditches and accidentally cut cables as we have seen in the past The s are outside of our current Lucent phone switch and give us the ability to make outside calls Currently s are located and connected correctly at the following locations John Buchanan EBN Pat Barry EBN Tracy Minter EBN But we need additional s installed at the following locations Terry Kowalke EBN Jack Howard EBNE Sherry Forbish EBNA This will accommodate Gas Logistics interim phone coverage plan between moves Please check to determine if the cost of these additional installations were included in the regular move schedule If you have any questions please advise We will place a at the reconnection site Thanks for you assistance Donna

RE Operational Capacity for TW Marketing Cc Darrell and Jerry Lets discuss on Thursday Jeanne thank you for your help Donna Original Message From Licciardo Jeanne Sent Wednesday February PM To Scott Donna Schoolcraft Darrell Graves Jerry Subject RE Operational Capacity for TW Marketing Here is the Operational Capacity for the points listed below If you have any questions please call me at Jeanne File pointOperationalCapacityxls Original Message From Scott Donna Sent Wednesday February AM To Licciardo Jeanne Subject Operational Capacity for TW Marketing Jeanne In talking with Mark McConnell Jerry Graves and Darrell Schoolcraft we think that if you can have David Duff pull the following point operational capacity out of TCI we can determine what Mark needs Please go back as far as you can in the database Some points may not exist because they were not in place back in or but pull as much history as you can Name POI SoCal Topock SoCal Needles PGE Topock SW Willow Valley N Starsteel Mojave Topock Citizen Kingman Citizen North Citizen Forest Branch Citizens Flagstaff Darrell Jerry and I would like to validate the information prior to forwarding to Mark so please send me the file and I will coordinate the review It might be helpful to know the field names in TCI if you cant find operational capacity We probably called it something different back then Thank you for your help Donna
NMOGAKim The New Mexico Oil Gas Associations Annual meeting is Oct th th Their web site is wwwnmogaorg Donna

Mastio and Survey Customer Feedback Planning SessionPlease plan to attend a meeting on August from am to am in C We will review the results of the customer specific Mastio results and website survey feedback Binders containing all the related documentation will be delivered to you this week for your review prior to the meeting During the meeting we will create customer relationship management action plans Thank you in advance for your participation Donna

RE Performance ReviewShelley How about meeting Tuesday Jan at pm I realize your schedule is subject to change and I will make myself available at your convenience if this doesnt work out Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Thursday January PM To Scott Donna Subject Performance Review Donna Attached is the written comments that I prepared while I was traveling I cant remember if I already sent this to you or not please forgive me if I already sent this to you sinus congestion is not conducive to sound thinking Let me know when you want to sit down and talk File SCOTT DONNA Ldoc

FW Dynegy Plan More ChangesShelley Please see the note below I recommend taking all the company numbers back to the original plan and any reduction that occurs during the year be viewed as a current estimate What are your thoughts Donna Original Message From Carpenter Nancy Sent Tuesday March PM To Scott Donna Cc Barnes Caroline Carpenter Nancy Subject Dynegy Plan More Changes Donna In a Dynegy meeting this afternoon we were instructed to change the Gas Logistics Dynegy Plan which we had submitted at M back to the Original Plan of M They viewed the reduction as more of a Current Estimate so from this point we will use the M as the official plan number for future comparisons At least for Dynegy purposes I will resubmit the plan to Steve Kleb this afternoon Please inform Shelley about this latest development Thanks Nancy
Post June InformationThis was a little harder than I thought hope it meets your needs Have a good vacation Donna
Revised Budget Without NNGShelley Here is a revised plan that uses the whole year to distribute costs into the future per our last conversation
Org ChartShelley I will email you the corresponding budget information tomorrow I still have some work to do on it Donna

RE GoalsMy change would be Negotiated and implemented the EAMR Citizens Service Agreement providing Citizens with Gas Control and transaction management services with no addition to staff and generating in payments for the service provided by Gas Logistics I have a question about Elizabeth Brown being promoted to a Coordinator Last year there was a big deal made about changing all the Coordinators to Specialists which upset some of the personnel Are we going to start using the job title of Coordinator again or should her title be Sr Contract Admin Specialist Donna Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Thursday January PM To January Steve Holmes Bradley Dietz Rick Blair Lynn Nacey Sheila Bryant Mike Scott Donna Cc Winters Ricki Subject Goals Please review and add appropriate information into the attached draft accomplishments Id like to circulate this document on Monday to fulfill the promise that I made at staff meeting FYI Im taking a day of vacation tomorrow because my babysitter is unavailable I will be around the house most of the day if you need me You can also call on my cell or send me an email File accomplishmentsdoc

Dynegy PlanThis is the information Nancy is turning in which ties to NNGs approved budget todate of The original numbers that were turned into Dynegy by Tracey showed the original Plan of This was inclusive the following ETS Communications NNG Gas Logistics Total Worksheet labeled variance explains the difference between what they currently have and the new numbers Please let me know if you would like to make any adjustments once you review Thanks Donna

FW Dynegy PlanFYI Ill keep you posted Original Message From Carpenter Nancy Sent Friday February PM To Scott Donna Krone Amy Cc Barnes Caroline Mayer Tony Subject Dynegy Plan Donna and Amy Dynegy has asked for a by month Dynegy Plan They would like to have at least the Income Statement by the end of the month which includes OM Im attaching James worksheet so you can see what level of detail they need I think you have both been working on a stand alone NNG plan but now were going to formalize it Next week James is sending out the final version of the worksheet along with due date information Ill keep you informed Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Nancy
Pipeline BudgetShelley I think this looks good Have a good weekend Donna
